  • The curious case of Oriini Kaipara’s ‘repossessed’ campaign truck · 2025-10-29 · properly-fucked
    Te Pāti Māori MP Oriini Kaipara’s campaign truck was briefly listed for sale as a repossessed vehicle before the listing disappeared, raising questions about its ownership and use during her by-election campaign.
  • Stuff · 2025-10-29 · properly-fucked
    Cabinet has agreed to require online casinos to contribute 4% of their profits to community groups, a significantly smaller proportion than in-person pokies, following widespread public concern.
  • Luxon: 'I've just done a deal'. Winston Peters’ X account: Make that 'We...' · 2025-10-29 · lightly-fucked
    Winston Peters’ official X account briefly reshared and corrected a trade-related post by Prime Minister Christopher Luxon before deleting it, with both ministers’ offices declining to comment on the incident.
  • Here's what the Government wants to teach kids, and why it's so controversial · 2025-10-29 · properly-fucked
    The New Zealand Government has released a draft curriculum for Years 0-10, aiming for a "refresh." However, it's already mired in controversy. While the ACT Party hails the removal of "Marxist" ideology and the Aotearoa Histories programme, educators warn of a "rushed rollout" and potential "chaos." Key flashpoints include the teaching of New Zealand history, colonisation, and the contentious approach to sexuality and consent in Health and PE.
  • Government and council impasse continues as 700 property owners wait · 2025-10-29 · lightly-fucked
    A standoff between Auckland Council and the Government has left about 700 property owners in limbo after a housing plan was withdrawn, with both sides blaming each other for the resulting legal and financial mess.
